server.translation[0].definitions[0].def: the main computer on a network, which controls all the others
server.translation[0].definitions[1].def: one of the computers on a network that provides a special service
server.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: All data is stored on a central file server.
server.translation[0].definitions[2].def: the player who hits the ball to begin a game in tennis, volleyball etc
server.translation[0].definitions[3].def: a special spoon for putting a particular type of food onto a plate
server.translation[0].definitions[4].def: someone whose job is to bring you your food in a restaurant
server.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a powerful computer used to store large amounts of information and to connect other smaller computers in a NETWORK. The smaller computers are sometimes called CLIENTs
server.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: The network kept crashing because it was running on a file server without enough memory.
